ABOUTME.DESCRIPTION: I enjoy creating something from nothing and letting my creativity shape the path to the result.
ABOUTME.LOCATION: Based in Hanover, I’m open to remote work and would consider relocating depending on the location.
ABOUTME.LEARNING: I’m a curious and eager-to-learn developer who is highly motivated to grow continuously – professionally by working with modern technologies and personally through new challenges in team settings and everyday project work.
ABOUTME.SOLUTIONS: I thrive in collaborative environments, communicate openly, and approach challenges with a balance of analytical thinking and creativity.

MYSKILLS.HEADLINE: My Skills
MYSKILLS.DESCRIPTION: During my training to become a front-end developer, I built strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
MYSKILLS.DESCRIPTION_SKILLS: I work with Angular, Firebase, and Git, and have initial experience with REST APIs, Material Design, and agile methods like Scrum.
MYSKILLS.LEARNING_SKILLS: My goal is to continuously expand my knowledge, learn new technologies, and contribute to building modern web applications.
MYSKILLS.INTEREST: I have a special interest in learning

PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO.EL_POLLO_LOCO: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
PORTFOLIO.POKEDEX: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

REVIEWS.FIRST: Michael really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
REVIEWS.SECOND: Michi was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
REVIEWS.THIRD: It was a great pleasure to work with Michael. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm, Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.EXPLAIN_INTERESTS: As a trained software developer with a focus on frontend and backend, I bring solid knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, Node.js, and relational databases. I am looking for a full-time position where I can apply my skills and continue to grow — motivated, eager to learn, and ready to create real value.
CONTACT.NAME: Your name
CONTACT.POLICY_THREE: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
